function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fecal-oral transmission route could prove significant.","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission of contagious diseases through fecal-oral route.","Mitigation":"Improvement of sanitation and hygiene practices, and public education on the risks of fecal-oral transmission.","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, wastewater treatment technologies.","People":"General population, especially in areas with poor sanitation infrastructure.","Owner":"Government health agencies, local authorities, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Fecal becoming an alternative route for clinical diagnostic testing for Covid-19.","Impact":"Potential for misdiagnosis and underestimation of Covid-19 cases if fecal testing is not considered.","Mitigation":"Integration of fecal testing into diagnostic protocols and guidelines, and coordination among healthcare providers.","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostic equipment for fecal testing.","People":"Healthcare professionals, laboratory technicians, and public health officials.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Prolonged presence of Covid-19 RNA in feces after respiratory tract tests negative.","Impact":"Risk of undetected infection and continued transmission if fecal shedding of the virus is not monitored.","Mitigation":"Implementation of wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) for surveillance of viral shedding in sewage, and public health campaigns on fecal shedding risks.","Technologies":"Waste water sampling and testing technologies.","People":"Public health officials, wastewater treatment professionals, and researchers.","Owner":"Public health agencies and research institutions."}]}
